question: Kalpana Dash, who passed away recently, was the noted woman mountaineer of which state?
explanation: Kalpana Dash (50), the first woman mountaineer of Odisha, has passed away near Balcony area of world\'s highest peak Mount Everest on May 23, 2019.She had first scaled Mt Everest in 2008. During her decade and half-old career, she had trekked many mountains conquering peaks in Europe, America and Australia, besides India.
